nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: You see all the gingerbread people in line ready to gamble away their chocolate chips. Nature is healing.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I can already feel the sweet taste of victory.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: My finances are crumbling exactly like an extra soft cookie.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: Triple chocolate cookie? More like triple my income. BRING IT ON!

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I eat excessive amounts of sugar to cope with the fact that my wife left me and took the kids because of my gambling addiction. So as I was saying, I would like to place a bet…

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: It’s 5 o’clock, time to spill the tea. Have you got something?

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: One of them desserts smells a bit fishy, don't you think? You wouldn’t happen to hear something ‘bout this?

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I’ve heard that Vanilla’s been putting extra sugar in the mix. You didn’t hear that from me.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: They look at you strangely and say: 'Who told you that?' Nothing useful there.

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: You step away from the gingerbread character.

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: You see a suspicious-looking fortune cookie standing in line. Who knows what message this peculiar dessert can bring you.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: Psss kid. Listen, you’re surrounded by all these sugary desserts, they’re gonna give you a sugar addiction. Why not skip straight to the last part? I got the right thing for you. Baking flour.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: Pssss. You over there. Wanna know the secret to every pastry recipe? Wanna know how these fighters got so good? Two words. Baking. Flour. You in?

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: I got whachu need. Hand over the chips. Pleasure doing business with you.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: You sure you got the chips for that? Don't try to pull crumbs on me, pal.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: Why so stressed ma guy, you need to feel more flour power *wink wink*

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: The strange fortune cookie watches you leave, its crisp shell gleaming under the neon bakery lights.

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: One of the coaches is approaching you, maybe they’re here to check the stats… oh, they’re here to gamble. That checks out.

nodes.speaker: coach
nodes.text: Every coach knows that the best way to support your fighter is through gambling. It shows an unbreakable bond. By that I mean I’ll break their bones if they lose.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: They say knowledge means power, and money also means power… by the law of commutativity, knowledge must mean money.

nodes.speaker: coach
nodes.text: Boy, you think I started baking yesterday? I see right through your dirty little scheme…

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: It would be such a shame if, let’s say, they found something in the lockers. Indeed a great shame that might require… financial compensation.

nodes.speaker: coach
nodes.text: Interesting. I see what you want me to do, kid. If you’ve got the chips, I’ll do it.

nodes.speaker: coach
nodes.text: You want me to betray my fighter? Unacceptable! The only suspicious white powder they’re gonna find is my homemade protein!

nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: You leave the coach to his protein shake and poor life choices.
